security_issues.message: Ensure VPC flow logging is enabled in all VPCs
Ensure the default security group of every VPC restricts all traffic

Artifact: main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability aws-autoscaling-enable-at-rest-encryption
Severity: MEDIUM
Message: VPC does not have VPC Flow Logs enabled.
Link: [aws-autoscaling-enable-at-rest-encryption](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/aws-autoscaling-enable-at-rest-encryption)

Artifact: main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability aws-vpc-no-public-ingress-acl
Severity: MEDIUM
Message: Network ACL rule allows unrestricted ingress from any IP address.
Link: [aws-vpc-no-public-ingress-acl](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/aws-vpc-no-public-ingress-acl)

Artifact: main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability aws-vpc-no-excessive-port-access
Severity: CRITICAL
Message: Network ACL rule allows access using ALL ports.
Link: [aws-vpc-no-excessive-port-access](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/aws-vpc-no-excessive-port-access)

Artifact: main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability aws-vpc-no-public-ingress-acl
Severity: MEDIUM
Message: Network ACL rule allows unrestricted ingress from any IP address.
Link: [aws-vpc-no-public-ingress-acl](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/aws-vpc-no-public-ingress-acl)

Artifact: main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability aws-vpc-no-public-ingress-acl
Severity: MEDIUM
Message: Network ACL rule allows unrestricted ingress from any IP address.
Link: [aws-vpc-no-public-ingress-acl](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/aws-vpc-no-public-ingress-acl)
Ensure that all EIP addresses allocated to a VPC are attached to EC2 instances
Ensure no default VPC is planned to be provisioned

Artifact: main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability aws-vpc-no-default-vpc
Severity: HIGH
Message: Default VPC is used.
Link: [aws-vpc-no-default-vpc](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/aws-vpc-no-default-vpc)

Artifact: main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability aws-autoscaling-enable-at-rest-encryption
Severity: MEDIUM
Message: VPC does not have VPC Flow Logs enabled.
Link: [aws-autoscaling-enable-at-rest-encryption](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/aws-autoscaling-enable-at-rest-encryption)
Ensure CloudWatch log groups retains logs for at least 1 year
Ensure that Security Groups are attached to another resource

unassigned_findings.message:
Artifact: terraform-aws-modules/s3-bucket/aws/main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability AVD-AWS-0088
Severity: HIGH
Message: Bucket does not have encryption enabled
Link: [AVD-AWS-0088](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/avd-aws-0088)

Artifact: terraform-aws-modules/s3-bucket/aws/main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability s3-bucket-logging
Severity: LOW
Message: Bucket has logging disabled
Link: [s3-bucket-logging](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/s3-bucket-logging)

Artifact: terraform-aws-modules/s3-bucket/aws/main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability AVD-AWS-0090
Severity: MEDIUM
Message: Bucket does not have versioning enabled
Link: [AVD-AWS-0090](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/avd-aws-0090)

Artifact: terraform-aws-modules/s3-bucket/aws/main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability AVD-AWS-0132
Severity: HIGH
Message: Bucket does not encrypt data with a customer managed key.
Link: [AVD-AWS-0132](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/avd-aws-0132)
